title: The Organic Farm Shop and Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic farm with a cafe that's all vegetarian except on Sundays when meat is offered. Menu changes daily and usually includes 1 or 2 soups plus, salads, and 2 main dishes alongside cakes, hummus, baked potatoes, drinks. Has Wi-Fi, green space around, simple and rustic atmosphere. Organizes courses, school visits, camping in summer. The shop sells fresh vegetable and fruit, groceries, natural household goods.
